name: Dark Age of Camelot: Labyrinth of the Minotaur
name_original: Dark Age of Camelot: Labyrinth of the Minotaur
description:
Dark Age of Camelot: Labyrinth of the Minotaur is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Electronic Arts Mythic. It came out on 14-11-2006. Electronic Arts published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Dark Age of Camelot: Labyrinth of the Minotaur on PC.
